summary:
General Teleportation Spell with Your Own Destination, Now with Teleport to Explored Citys.
Can Now Teleport to Owned Houses (Need Key) Including Harthfire Houses (Must be Built)
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]Description[/size][/b][/u]
This mod serves to add a General Teleportation Spell to the game.

[b][u][size=4][color=red]Required[/color][/size][/b][/u]
[b][size=4][color=red]Harthfire DLC[/color][/size][/b] From Ver 1.4
[b][size=4][color=red][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI V3[/url][/color][/size][/b]  From Ver 1.6

[b][u]New Spell[/u][/b]
1.  Teleport to Destination
[list][*]With this Spell You Can Select where you want to Teleport to.
[*]The menu will popup with Destination Selection
[*]City
[*]Village
[*]House  (Ver 1.4)
[*]Last Destination Set
[*]Return (To the Last Teleport to Destination Source position)[/list]
2.  Set Destination
[list]
[*]Set Teleport Destination
[*]Teleporting from player(MOD) buildings/worlds could create a Gray world Destination
[/list]

[b][size=3][color=red]By Default both these 2 Source/Destination points are in \"Whiterun Dragons Reach\" Balcony on the Right as you Enter[/color][/size][/b]

This Mod is Follower Friendly (For 1 Follower)

[b][u][size=4]Destinations[/size][/u][/b]
[b][u]Village[/u][/b]
[list][*]Dragon Bridge
[*]Helgen
[*]Ivarstead
[*]Kathwasten
[*]Riverwood
[*]Rorikstead
[*]Shor\'s Stone[/list]
[b][u]City[/u][/b]
[list][*]Dawnstar
[*]Falkreath
[*]Markarth
[*]Morthal
[*]Riften
[*]Solitude
[*]Whiterun
[*]Windhelm
[*]Winterhold[/list]
[b][u]House[/u][/b] (From Ver 1.4) (Must have the Key) (HarthFire must complete small house)
[list][*]Dawnstar  (Harthfire)
[*]Falkreath (HarthFire)
[*]Markarth
[*]Morthal   (HarthFire)
[*]Riften
[*]Solitude
[*]Windhelm
[*]Whiterun[/list]
[b][u]Orc Village[/u][/b]
[list][*]Dushnikh Yal
[*]Largashbur
[*]Mor Khazgur
[*]Narzulbur[/list]
[b][u]Inn/Tavern[/u][/b]
[list][*]Braidwood
[*]Nightgate
[*]Old Hroldan
[*]The Stumbling Sabrecat[/list]
[b][u]Places[/u][/b]
[list][*]Dayspring Canyon
[*]High Hrothgar
[*]Paarthunax
[*]Sky Haven Temple
[*]The Ragged Flagon
[*]Vampire Castle[/list]
[b][u]Mines[/u][/b]
[list][*]Bilegulch
[*]Embershard
[*]Gloombound
[*]Goldenrock
[*]Knifepoint
[*]Kolsegg
[*]Lefthand
[*]Lost Prospect
[*]Northwind
[*]Steamscorch
[*]Stonehills
[*]Whistling[/list]
[b][u]Lumber Mill[/u][/b]
[list][*]Anga\'s
[*]Half-moon
[*]Heartwood
[*]Mixwater
[*]Solitude[/list]

[b][u]Where to Get it[/u][/b]
[spoiler]
Riverwood Trader Under the Counter
  Once you have done the Dragon Claw Quest you don\'t have to steal it.
On the Desk in Dragons Reach by the Mage
[/spoiler]

[b][u][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u]
Should be compatible with anything. 

[b][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][/u]
[b][color=red][size=3]Uninstall any previous versions of this mod first[/size][/color][/b]
Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager or put the contents of this mod in your Skyrim\'s data folder.

[b][u][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/b][/u]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager or Delete this mod\'s files from your Skyrim\'s data folder.

[b][u][size=4]Credits[/size][/b][/u]

[b][u][size=4]My Other Mods[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19572]RustyTraders Harvest The Dead[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14467]RustyTraders Teleportation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22984]RustyTraders Magic Arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19798]RustyTraders Ghost Form[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28315]RustyTraders Auto Harvest[/url]
author: RustyTrader

files.name: Rustys_Teleport_with_Control_V1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a Typo in the Spell Text
Added the Missing Menu Art (Spell Menu)
Fixed the Spell Cost as it was 0

files.name: Rustys_Teleport_with_Control_V1_2
files.changelogHtml: Teleport can be cast during Comabt

files.name: Rustys_Teleport_With_Control_V1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Return Option Only Shows Once you Teleported
Last Set Only shows if you have set a Destination
Add the Wood Mills as Destinations
Add the Mines as Destination
Add some Other Destinations

files.name: Rustys_Teleport_With_Control_V1_5_1
files.changelogHtml: Fix the Pointers for the Taverns
